author: Cortex XSOAR

classifier.description: Maps incoming Gmail phishing email message fields.
classifier.name: Gmail - Incoming Mapper

commands.description: Lists all labels in the user's mailbox.
commands.name: gmail-list-labels

commands.description: Deletes a Gmail user.
commands.name: gmail-delete-user

commands.description: Lists all tokens associated with a specified user. applications.
commands.name: gmail-get-tokens-for-user

commands.description: Gets information for a specified user.
commands.name: gmail-get-user

commands.description: Retrieves a list of all Google roles for a specified user.
commands.name: gmail-get-user-roles

commands.description: Retrieves attachments from a sent Gmail message.
commands.name: gmail-get-attachments

commands.description: Retrieves the Gmail message sent to a specified user.
commands.name: gmail-get-mail

commands.description: Searches for Gmail records of a specified Google user.
commands.name: gmail-search

commands.description: Searches the Gmail records for all Google users.
commands.name: gmail-search-all-mailboxes

commands.description: Lists all Google users in a domain.
commands.name: gmail-list-users

commands.description: Revokes a role for a specified Google user.
commands.name: gmail-revoke-user-role

commands.description: Creates a new Gmail user.
commands.name: gmail-create-user

commands.description: Deletes an email in the user's mailbox.
commands.name: gmail-delete-mail

commands.description: Returns all messages in a thread.
commands.name: gmail-get-thread

commands.description: Moves an email to a different folder.
commands.name: gmail-move-mail

commands.description: Moves an email to a different mailbox.
commands.name: gmail-move-mail-to-mailbox

commands.description: Adds a rule for email deletion by address.
commands.name: gmail-add-delete-filter

commands.description: Add a new filter.
commands.name: gmail-add-filter

commands.description: List all filters in a user's mailbox.
commands.name: gmail-list-filters

commands.description: Removes a Filter.
commands.name: gmail-remove-filter

commands.description: Hide a user's contact information, such as email address, profile information in the Global Directory.
commands.name: gmail-hide-user-in-directory

commands.description: Sets the password for the user.
commands.name: gmail-set-password

commands.description: Returns the auto-reply message set for the user-account.
commands.name: gmail-get-autoreply

commands.description: Sets the auto-reply for the user. Note: If the body is not set, the current body will be deleted.
commands.name: gmail-set-autoreply

commands.description: Adds a delegate to the mailbox, without sending any verification email. The delegate user must be a member of the same G Suite organization as the delegator user and must be added using their primary email address, and not an email alias.
commands.name: gmail-delegate-user-mailbox

commands.description: Sends mail using Gmail.
commands.name: send-mail

commands.description: Replies to a mail using Gmail.
commands.name: reply-mail

commands.description: Removes a delegate from the mailbox, without sending any verification email. The delegate user must be a member of the same G Suite organization as the delegator user using their primary email address, and not an email alias.
commands.name: gmail-remove-delegated-mailbox

commands.description: Get details of a specific role.
commands.name: gmail-get-role

commands.description: Creates a forwarding address. If ownership verification is required, a message will be sent to the recipient and the resource's verification status will be set to pending; otherwise, the resource will be created with verification status set to accepted. This method is only available to service account clients that have been delegated domain-wide authority.
commands.name: gmail-forwarding-address-add

commands.description:
Creates a custom "from" send-as alias. If an SMTP MSA is specified, Gmail will attempt to connect to the SMTP service to validate the configuration before creating the alias. If ownership verification is required for the alias, a message will be sent to the email address and the resource's verification status will be set to pending; otherwise, the resource will be created with verification status set to accepted. If a signature is provided, Gmail will sanitize the HTML before saving it with the alias.

This command is only available to service account clients who have been delegated domain-wide authority.
commands.name: gmail-send-as-add

integration.description: Gmail API and user management (This integration replaces the Gmail functionality in the GoogleApps API and G Suite integration).
integration.name: Gmail

playbook.description: This playbook searches Gmail to identify and delete emails with similar attributes to the malicious email.
playbook.name: Search And Delete Emails - Gmail

playbook.description:
This v2 playbook uses the reporter's email headers to retrieve the original email. This decreases the number of tasks to retrieve the original email. 
Use this playbook to retrieve the original email using the Gmail integration, including headers and attachments.
Note: You must have the necessary Google Apps Domain-Wide Delegation of Authority permissions in your Gmail service to execute global search.
playbook.name: Get Original Email - Gmail v2

description: Gmail API and user management (This integration replaces the Gmail functionality in the GoogleApps API and G Suite integration).
name: Gmail
